description: Gapcoin is a new prime number based p2p cryptocurrency, which tries to eliminate the sticking points of other scientific currencies like Primecoin or Riecoin. It 's a fork of Satoshi Nakamotos Bitcoin, a decentralized payment system which is independent of banks, governments and other centralized regulators. With Gapcoin,you will be able to anonymously send money around the globe in no time.
summary: This template deploys Gapcoin on a Ubuntu node within Azure
